oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Government Boulevard, Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of Government Boulevard on Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga. Features a divided back for correspondence on reverse. Postcard printed in Great Britain. [No. 402.123]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roads; Mountains; Trees
